object.property: If something has gone horribly wrong you can try a slow sync, start from scratch or restore from backup.
A slow sync compares items from both sides and tries to merge them. This may fail in some cases, leading to duplicates or lost information.
Delete all your local information and replace with data from Zyb

property.name: label
property.comments: text between the two "start from scratch" buttons in emergency view

object.property: Delete all data on Zyb and replace with your local information
Backups are made before every time we Sync. Choose a backup to restore. Any changes you have made since then will be lost.
Backup before syncing two hours ago
To sync you'll need a network connection and an account with a sync service. We support the following services:
If you don't see your service above but know that your sync provider uses SyncML you can setup a service manually.
Use Bluetooth to Sync your data from one device to another.
You will need to add Bluetooth devices before they can be synced.

property.name: label
property.comments: title for the buttons on the right side of main view

property.name: label
property.comments: Button in main view, right side. Keep to below 20 chars per line, feel free to use two lines

property.name: label
property.comments: button in main view, right side. Keep length to 20 characters or so, use two lines if needed
